name: Discord Bot
description: I have made multiple bots for chat application "Discord" over the years.

name: BakkesMod Plugin
description: A plugin for video game "Rocket League" that allows Twitch streamers to share their current car loadout with their viewers.

name: Personal Website
description: This website that you're currently looking at is always a work-in-progress.

name: Microsoft Teams Chatbot
description: A chatbot that facilitates integration with security services, streamlining operations.

name: Oaxaca (Group Project)
description: A web-based restaurant operational management system.

name: Dyno Food Wizard
description: A website from a hackathon that allowed the user to upload an image of their food and returned nutritional information.

name: Shoe Fighter (Group Project)
description: A 2D local PvP fighting game, where players fight against each other as types of shoes.

name: Train Exit Database
description: A website that allows users to enter journey details to see the best location at which to disembark the train (i.e. closest to the station exit).
